name: Discovery and Assessment
description: Identify and analyze the incident to determine if a breach has occurred and assess the scope of affected PHI

name: Breach Risk Assessment
description: Conduct formal risk assessment to determine if notification is required based on probability of compromise

name: Notification Planning
description: Prepare breach notification plan including contact list and communication strategy

name: Individual Notification
description: Notify affected individuals of breach without unreasonable delay
timeline: Without unreasonable delay but no more than 60 calendar days

name: Media Notification
description: Notify prominent media outlets if breach affects more than 500 residents in a single jurisdiction
timeline: Simultaneously with individual notification or without unreasonable delay

name: Secretary Notification
description: Notify Secretary of HHS of breach affecting more than 500 individuals or any breach within 60 days
timeline: Without unreasonable delay but no more than 60 calendar days

name: Breach Log Maintenance
description: Document all breaches in breach log including discovery date notification date and individuals notified

name: Documentation and Reporting
description: Prepare comprehensive breach report documenting all aspects of incident and response

name: Mitigation Services Coordination
description: Arrange and provide mitigation services to affected individuals

name: Post-Breach Follow-up
description: Monitor for further security issues and implement corrective actions
